column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The last item we had was the chocolate brioche. What this is
column2: is a small brioche bun filled with what seems like just a dollop of chocolate ganache
column3: and then glazed with some of the same chocolate. The brioche is everything you want it to be: eggy
column5: and with some give. I think why this one is so effective though is because they resist the temptation to overwhelm you with chocolate. It's the perfect amount to make sure that the main star here is the brioche
column6: which is certainly worthy of it
